mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBL_ROOMS
SELECT CATEGORY_NO ,UP_CATEGORY_NO ,CATEGORY_NAME ,DEPTH ,SORT FROM TBL_CATEGORY WHERE UP_CATEGORY_NO = #{roomNo} START WITH CATEGORY_NO = '1' CONNECT BY PRIOR CATEGORY_NO = UP_CATEGORY_NO
SELECT CATEGORY_NO ,UP_CATEGORY_NO ,CATEGORY_NAME ,DEPTH ,SORT FROM TBL_CATEGORY WHERE UP_CATEGORY_NO IS NOT NULL START WITH CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo} CONNECT BY CATEGORY_NO = PRIOR UP_CATEGORY_NO

SELECT CATEGORY_NO ,UP_CATEGORY_NO ,LPAD(' ', (LEVEL-1)* 4 ) || CATEGORY_NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME ,DEPTH ,SORT FROM TBL_CATEGORY START WITH CATEGORY_NO = '1' CONNECT BY PRIOR CATEGORY_NO = UP_CATEGORY_NO
SELECT CATEGORY_NO FROM TBL_CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_NAME = #{ categoryName }
SELECT OPT_CATEGORY_NO, OPT_CATEGORY_NM FROM TBL_OPTION_CAEGORY
SELECT * FROM TBL_BRAND
SELECT BRAND_NO FROM TBL_BRAND WHERE BRAND_NAME = #{ brandName }
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BRAND WHERE REPLACE(TRIM(BRAND_NAME), ' ', '') = #{ brandName }
SELECT SEQ_PROD_NO.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT A.PROD_NO) FROM TBL_PRODUCT A
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT A.PROD_NO) FROM TBL_PRODUCT A

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(A.PROD_NO)) FROM TBL_PRODUCT A LEFT JOIN TBL_CATEGORY B ON A.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_NO WHERE A.PROD_AVAIL_YN = 'Y' AND A.CATEGORY_NO IN (SELECT AA.CATEGORY_NO FROM TBL_CATEGORY AA START WITH AA.CATEGORY_NO = #{ category } CONNECT BY PRIOR AA.CATEGORY_NO = AA.UP_CATEGORY_NO)

SELECT DENSE_RANK() OVER ( ORDER BY A.PROD_INST_DATE DESC, A.PROD_NO DESC) RANK, A.PROD_NO, B.CATEGORY_NAME, C.BRAND_NO, C.BRAND_NAME, A.PROD_NAME, A.PROD_DESC, A.PROD_PRICE, A.DISCOUNT_RATE, A.PROD_DETAIL_CONTENT, A.PROD_DETAIL_VIEW_COUNT, A.PROD_INST_DATE, A.PROD_UPT_DATE, A.PROD_AVAIL_YN, A.PROD_SIZE, A.PROD_COLOR FROM TBL_PRODUCT A LEFT JOIN TBL_CATEGORY B ON (A.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_BRAND C ON (A.BRAND_NO = C.BRAND_NO)
WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT DENSE_RANK() OVER ( ORDER BY A.PROD_INST_DATE DESC, A.PROD_NO DESC) RANK, A.PROD_NO, B.CATEGORY_NAME, C.BRAND_NAME, A.PROD_NAME, A.PROD_DESC, A.PROD_PRICE, A.DISCOUNT_RATE, A.PROD_DETAIL_CONTENT, A.PROD_DETAIL_VIEW_COUNT, A.PROD_INST_DATE, A.PROD_UPT_DATE, A.PROD_AVAIL_YN, A.PROD_SIZE, A.PROD_COLOR FROM TBL_PRODUCT A LEFT JOIN TBL_CATEGORY B ON (A.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_BRAND C ON (A.BRAND_NO = C.BRAND_NO) WHERE A.PROD_AVAIL_YN = 'Y'

SELECT A.PROD_NO , B.CATEGORY_NO , B.CATEGORY_NAME , C.BRAND_NAME , C.BRAND_NO , A.PROD_NAME , A.PROD_DESC , A.DISCOUNT_RATE , A.PROD_PRICE , A.PROD_DETAIL_CONTENT , A.PROD_DETAIL_VIEW_COUNT , A.PROD_INST_DATE , A.PROD_UPT_DATE , A.PROD_AVAIL_YN , A.PROD_SIZE , A.PROD_COLOR , T.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_PRODUCT A LEFT JOIN TBL_CATEGORY B ON(A.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_BRAND C ON(A.BRAND_NO = C.BRAND_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT T ON(A.PROD_NO = T.REF_PROD_NO)
WHERE A.PROD_NO = #{ prodNo }

SELECT DISTINCT(A.PROD_NO) , A.PROD_PRICE , A.PROD_DETAIL_VIEW_COUNT , A.PROD_INST_DATE , B.SECTION , A.CATEGORY_NO FROM TBL_PRODUCT A LEFT JOIN TBL_CATEGORY B ON(A.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_BRAND C ON(A.BRAND_NO = C.BRAND_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT AA.PROD_NO AS AAPNO FROM TBL_PRODUCT AA GROUP BY AA.PROD_NO) RT ON(RT.AAPNO = A.PROD_NO) WHERE A.PROD_AVAIL_YN = 'Y'
AND A.CATEGORY_NO IN (SELECT AA.CATEGORY_NO FROM TBL_CATEGORY AA START WITH AA.CATEGORY_NO = #{ category } CONNECT BY PRIOR AA.CATEGORY_NO = AA.UP_CATEGORY_NO)
SELECT REF_PROD_NO , THUMBNAIL_PATH , SAVE_PATH FROM TBL_ATTACHMENT WHERE ATTACH_STATUS_YN = 'Y' AND FILE_TYPE = 'THUMB_MAIN' AND REF_PROD_NO = #{ prodNo }
SELECT REF_PROD_NO , THUMBNAIL_PATH , SAVE_PATH FROM TBL_ATTACHMENT WHERE ATTACH_STATUS_YN = 'Y' AND FILE_TYPE = 'THUMB_SUB' AND REF_PROD_NO = #{ prodNo }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BRAND ( BRAND_NO , BRAND_NAME ) VALUES ( (SELECT MAX(BRAND_NO)+1 FROM TBL_BRAND) , #{ brandName } )

INSERT INTO TBL_OPTION ( OPTION_NO ,REF_PROD_NO ,REF_STOCK_NO ,OPTION_NAME ,OPTION_VALUE ,OPTION_EXTRA_CHARGE ) VALUES ( SEQ_OPT_NO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_PROD_NO.CURRVAL , NULL , #{ optionName} , #{ optionValue } , #{ optionExtChrg } )

INSERT INTO TBL_ATTACHMENT ( ATTACHMENT_NO , REF_PROD_NO , REF_REVW_NO , REF_INQ_NO , ORIG_FILE_NAME , SAVE_FILE_NAME , SAVE_PATH , THUMBNAIL_PATH , FILE_TYPE , ATTACH_STATUS_YN ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATTACH_NO.NEXTVAL , #{ refProdNo } , NULL , NULL , #{ origFileName } , #{ saveFileName } , #{ savePath } , #{ thumbnailPath } , #{ fileType } , DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT A.OPTION_NO , A.REF_PROD_NO , A.OPTION_NAME , A.OPTION_VALUE , A.OPTION_EXTRA_CHARGE FROM TBL_OPTION A WHERE A.REF_PROD_NO = #{ prodNo }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_OPTION A WHERE A.REF_PROD_NO = (SELECT B.PROD_NO FROM TBL_PRODUCT B WHERE A.REF_PROD_NO = B.PROD_NO AND B.PROD_NO = #{ prodNo })
